授業目的: This course introduces students to major topics in modern Japan-China relations, focusing on the cultural and social dimensions.
到達目標: Students will gain a general understanding of the cultural and social ties between Japan and China in the modern era.
特記事項: 【合併】総合日本学習科目（日中関係論）（CIEC）/Japan-China Relations（国際学部）

トピック.授業計画1: Topics in modern Japan-China cultural and social relations will be selected to reflect student interests as well as current scholarly research.
トピック.授業外学習2: Weekly readings, essay topics, and presentation prompts will be announced in class.
